title: UK में रह रहे पेशेंट का वीडियो पाकिस्तान में कोरोना से मरने वाले 26 साल के डॉक्टर के नाम से वायरल
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim: There is currently no specific treatment for coronavirus. Antibiotics do not help, as they do not work against viruses. Treatment aims to relieve the symptoms while your body fights the illness. You’ll need to stay in isolation, away from other people, until you have recovered.
